channel.title: Vegan on Brixton Local
channel.description: Recent content in Vegan on Brixton Local

item.title: Blank Brixton
item.description: Antipodean cafe, banging out Brixton’s best plant based food. When you come to Blank we promise an EPIC experience while you eat the most amazingly fresh food.” Link to Whatsapp ordering and menu here: https://linktr.ee/Blankbrixton How to order: Order through Whatsapp (see link in notes or check their facebook or instagram page @blankbrixton). Hours: M-F 7am-3pm,S 8am-3pm Sun 9am-3pm Website: https://www.blankbrixtoncafe.com/home Address: 144 Acre Lane, Brixton, SW2 5UT

item.title: Pipoca Vegan
item.description: A vegan creperie and zero waste refill centre, now also selling fresh fruit & veg How to order: In store (crepes available via Deliveroo) Website: https://www.facebook.com/pipocavegan/ @pipocavegan (instagram) Address: 224 Brixton Road SW9 6AH
